name: Long Truck
description:
Drive the red truck and collect blue spheres to increase the length of the trailer chain. Try to deliver the longest trailer chain possible to the delivery target pointed at by the yellow arrow. 

Your final score will be the length of the trailer chain you delivered.

Your trailer chain will get shortened if any of the trailer hits a building or the truck cabin hits any of the trailers.

If the truck hist any building you lose.

If you tip the truck over you lose.

---

Your suggestions/donations will help development of better versions of this game and other weird experiments
